title: Vuelta a España start list: Vingegaard vs. Remco vs. Roglic vs. everyone else
content:
Sepp Kuss starts his third grand tour of the season, and the best of the Spanish peloton line up for what should be a fantastic edition of La Vuelta.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España start list: Vingegaard vs. Remco vs. Roglic vs. everyone else on Velo.
author: ahood
